Package edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.actionselection.behaviornetwork

Contains classes related to the Behavior Network implementation of Action Selection.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
BehaviorExciteStrategy An excite strategy for behaviors in the behavior network.
CandidateThresholdReducer A strategy to reduce the threshold for action selection.
Selector A strategy for choosing which behavior to execute.
 

Class Summary
BasicCandidateThresholdReducer Basic strategy to reduce candidate threshold
BasicSelector Selector that chooses Behavior with maximum activation
BehaviorNetworkImpl A modern implementation of Maes' behavior network.
ConflictorExciteStrategy Strategy determining how a conflictor is inhibited.
PredecessorExciteStrategy Strategy that determines how a predecessor is excited.
SuccessorExciteStrategy Strategy that determines how a successor is excited.
 

Package edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.actionselection.behaviornetwork Description

Contains classes related to the Behavior Network implementation of Action Selection.
